thread.title: Can't say enough about this place
thread.title_full: Can't say enough about this place - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ginabass
title: Can't say enough about this place
text:
Came here for a quick get away between Christmas and New Years to catch a show with the husband-this hotel is beautiful-our new Fav in NYC-room is beautifully appointed-very small but most rooms in NYC are-spend the extra money and get the rooms with the view of the Empire State Building-so worth it. We walked to the theater, a huge plus, didn't need to bother with cabs etc. Also close to great restaurants and Times Square. Bed was very comfortable-linens were perfect-great rooftop bar, don't miss that. Room had beautiful hard wood floor and modern bathroom-windows the whole length of the wall. Hotel also has a great restaurant, food is delicious-oh!! I can't forget, upon check my husband mentioned in passing that it was my birthday and the sent us up a great bottle of champagne and choc covered strawberries-how sweet! We will be staying here every time we venture into the city!!
Room Tip: Get a room with a view of the Empire State Building-so pretty See more room tips
